urlText: Fish Market lift out of service
content: The lift at Fish Market light rail stop is out of service until further notice. Do not use if the doors open. Use the ramp via Bank St on the opposite side to enter or exit the stop.
subtitle: Fish Market lift out of service

properties.smsText: Fish Market lift out of service
